title: China's President stated they would like a peaceful solution to North Korea.
body:
Trump stated: If China would like to help solve the problem that would be great if not we (USA) will solve it without them.

Honestly, I'm looking forward to the day N.Korea is dissolved.
The leader of N.Korea's wife has a handbag that is 1,200 USD which is the ANNUAL SALARY of a typical N.Korean.

N.Korea causes terror to S.Korea which are not allowed to progress in peace.
N.Korea people constantly try to look for ways out to escape N.Korea (you can google this) and if caught they get punished or your family is punished if you're caught escaping the country. Those people are trapped in that country... TRAPPED. N.Korea regulates all resources to its people and everything in there looks like its currently 1955 while the rest of the world (most) is in 2017. 

https://forum.smartcanucks.ca/attachments/canadian-contests/184281d1372952750-club-q-q107-loyalty-club-southern-only-v4-american-flag-bald-eagle.jpg

Time for USA and the allied nations to dispense some Democracy.
